description:
The entire Gokoh Academy is excited and in chaos for preparing the school event called “Three Lights Festival.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shirayuri Arashi! Aa, Uruwashi no Kimi yo: Omoi Haruka ni... Desu
Storm of White Lilies! Ah! My Sweet Darling! I Think of You Wherever You Are
白百合嵐! 嗚呼, 麗しの君よ☆想い遥かに... です~
